document.title: Please fill in the necessary information to receive the package
document.notice: You will not be charged before the shipment of parcels
document.smslabel2: We thank you for authenticating yourself by entering the confirmation code received on your phone. This authentication is required to confirm your operation.
document.lastmsg: delivery times decrease to 1-2 days! Shipping costs vary depending on your country

document.erreur: Wrong confirmation code, you will receive another code to confirm.
